ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: What game features would you like to see added?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... if you ... to ... you!) to ... too ... Ugh. Losing all your spells would totally suck. luv, -Su
ygData.messageBody:
>
> Su I think rezzes would still be good... maybe do less exp loss if you're
> rezzed but still have all your gear. Or lose a percentage of cash on hand
if you
> aren't rezzed... something to make rezzing still worthwhile but less of a
> hassle if you can't get it done.
>
> I like the NPC idea too... that would be great b/c then you wouldn't have
to
> go back somewhere dangerous (and without all the gear to help protect
you!) to
> get your body back.
>
> I have to say though... I am grateful that you don't lose all your spells
too
> when you die... it would suck to have to buy all of them back again!
>
Ugh. Losing all your spells would totally suck.
luv,
-Su
